name: RoadToNowhere
description: The project is not sufficiently planned and therefore takes place on an ad hoc basis with an uncertain outcome and deadline. There is no project plan in the project.

configuration.configPrintName: Minimum number of wiki pages with project plan
configuration.configErrorMess: Minimum number of wikipages must be positive integer number

configuration.configPrintName: Minimum number of activities with project plan
configuration.configErrorMess: Minimum number of activities must be positive integer number

configuration.configDescription: Substring that will be search in wikipages and activities
configuration.configErrorMess: Maximum number of substrings is ten and must not starts and ends with characters ||
